description: Manual game result overrides for testing. Set 'enabled' to true and add game overrides to test scoring.

usage.2_add_overrides: Add game overrides in the 'overrides' object with game ID as key
usage.3_format: Each override needs: scoreA (away team), scoreB (home team), status ('final', 'in_progress', or 'scheduled')

_example_401845001._comment: This is an example - remove underscore prefix from key to use

partial_tournament.description: Enable only first 5 games as final to test partial scoring

knockout_test.description: Test knockout round scoring (2 points per correct pick)

medal_test.description: Test medal round scoring (3 points per correct pick)
